Born in 1934

Style meets performance. Wolf commercial kitchen equipment delivers
distinctive features and reliable results to keep your restaurant operating at
its peak. Wolf’s hardworking line of ranges, charbroilers and griddles are
easy to use and trusted in the industry for more than 80 years.
